MKSA

I am a security engineer, computer science researcher, and amateur physicist. This site serves as a repository for my personal projects, which encompass industrial design, experimental physics, light as an art medium, electronic musical instruments, and more. I am a strong advocate for open-source technology and improving the accessibility of science. Please feel free to reach out regarding any of my work.
